intro:
Drop sushi and stack them up!
Grow your sushi stack bigger and taller, and aim for a new high score!
description:
Drop sushi onto the sushi geta below!
Pile them up, but be careful not to let them fall onto the counter!

[Score Attack]
Increase your score and aim for the top of the global leaderboards!

[Co-op Score Attack]
Work together with up to 4 players to increase your score and rank at the top of the global leaderboards!
In online mode, play together with people from around the world!

[Battle]
Drop sushi and battle with up to 4 players until only 1 player remains!
In online mode, battle with players from around the world and aim for the top of the global leaderboards!
